sources.title: La sedia a rotelle (Murder Is a Murder) (1972) Crime, Mystery | Jean-Claude Brialy | Full Movie
sources.description:
Murder mystery involving a man and his relationship with twin sisters.

Original title: Un meurtre est un meurtre (1972) AKA: Murder is a Murder / The Wheelchair

Director: Etienne Périer
Writers: Dominique Fabre, Etienne Périer
Stars: Jean-Claude Brialy, Stéphane Audran, Robert Hossein
Genres: Crime, Drama, Mystery

This film is in Italian & available with many subtitle language options.

@CultCinemaClassics
